sentences.en: As we saw in the preceding chapter, groups can be powerful agents of socialization.
sentences.cn: 如我们在前一章所见，团组可以是社会化的有力动因。

sentences.en: Each generation surpasses the preceding one.
His gloom of the preceding night had quite gone.
sentences.cn: 他前一天晚上那种阴郁的神情已经一扫而光.

sentences.en: His testimony contradicted that of the preceding witness.
sentences.cn: 他的证词和前一位的互相矛盾.

sentences.en: Industrial orders had already fallen in the preceding months.
sentences.cn: 工业订单在前几个月就已减少。

sentences.en: Now, as on each preceding day, letters were handed her by the doorman at the Casino.
sentences.cn: 现在, 像前些天一样, 每天卡西诺戏院的门房都要把一些信件交给她.

sentences.en: The author had anticipated the question in a preceding chapter.
sentences.cn: 作者在前一章中就已经考虑到这一问题.

sentences.en: The close agreement suggests the adequacy of the preceding theoretical equations.
sentences.cn: 由于吻合程度好,说明上述理论方程式是适用的.

sentences.en: The plots of this novel in the preceding chapters are so complicated that I couldn't follow them.
sentences.cn: 这本小说前几章的情节如此复杂,以至于我都看不懂.

sentences.en: The preceding chapters discussed the various control elements or units.
sentences.cn: 在前面几章已经讨论了几种控制元件或器件.

sentences.en: The preceding discussion gives only the general issues likely to arise in an EIS case.
sentences.cn: 前面的讨论仅给出了某一“环境影响报告书”案例中可能产生的一般性问题.

sentences.en: The preceding paragraphs were concerned with inter - source offsets.
sentences.cn: 前文牵涉到污染源之间的补偿.

sentences.en: The preface to this book is on the preceding page.
sentences.cn: 前边一页是这本书的序言.

sentences.en: This phrase serves as a connecting link between the preceding and the following.
sentences.cn: 这个短语起到了承上启下的作用.

sentences.en: This point has been dealt with in the preceding paragraph.
sentences.cn: 这一点在前面一段里已经交代过了.

trans.tran_cn: （时间或地点上）在先的，在前的，前面的，前述的，上述的
trans.tran_en: happening or coming before the time, place, or part mentioned

trans.tran_cn: 在…之前发生（或出现），走在…前面，先于，“precede”的现在分词
